column1: Students are blocking the way go upstairs...
Student 1: Where is the C Block by the way?

column2: I was going to ask you where is dining hall.

column1: Student 1: What is it to you? Get lost!

column2: I just wanted to ask where Student Affairs office is.

column1: Student 2: How about you watch this video with us? *Points their phone to you*
I guess I have to take you all down!
